com.anji.tournament
Class DirectTournament

java.lang.Object
  com.anji.tournament.SimpleTournament
      com.anji.tournament.DirectTournament
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, Tournament
public class DirectTournament
extends SimpleTournament
implements Configurable

Each contestant plays 1 game against each opponent.

Author:
Philip Tucker
